integration_patterns: Data Interchange Standards for Health Care

evidence.claim: Harmony Care Management utilizes FHIR standards in their health information exchange.
The company mentions compliance with HL7 standards for healthcare data transmission.
They focus on data interoperability with EHRs, suggesting their platform integrates with multiple systems using standard health tech rails.
The mention of X12 suggests that the company engages in standard electronic data interchange for healthcare transactions.

icp.icp_reason: Limited evidence of X12 use cases or clearinghouse functions.
